name: Braden Smith
blurb: Best player in the country. Nothing more to be said.

name: Kylan Boswell
blurb: Playing the best basketball of his career.

name: Bennett Stirtz
blurb: Been impressive so far. Competition starts to ratchet up soon and we will see if he rises to the occasion.

name: Jaxon Kohler
blurb: Jeremy Fears Jr. might be the leader of this team, but Jaxon Kohler is the engine.
